__e: All right, with these sessions here at my house, I guess it was inevitable that my personal life would intrude occasionally.
Sure, they don't ask a lot of questions, but it's inevitable someone puts two and two together.
WELL, THEY'VE ONLY BEEN TELLING ME THAT SINCE I WAS SIX, SO, UH... SOONER OR LATER, I WAS BOUND TO BELIEVE IT.
Look, I'm sure you're a nice person and that you mean well, but "inevitable" -- that's a fightin' word where I come from.
Yeah, well, it's not such a big party, so it's probably inevitable. And I wanted to talk to you.
You don't start out that way, but it's inevitable. It's the way things are.
Today we saved all those people because of you.
This does not mean that war is bound to come, but there is a risk of this and we must all be prepared for it.
As for me, I always assumed growing up happened dogmatically as you got older but it's really something you have to choose to do.
